name: Classic Canvatote
description:
This classic black Canvatote is perfect for delivering a canvas to a client or carrying a few for an art installation. Even use it to pack your samples to show clients during a meeting or ordering session. The canvatote is lightweight and made of strong natural cotton with cotton-webbed handles and a little pocket inside great for holding business cards or hanging hardware. 

Approximate dimensions are 25” wide x 24” high (depth depends on items inside); interior pocket is 7.5” wide x 5.5” high.

name: Blush Canvatote
description:
This blush (bright pink) canvatote is a limited edition. 

Perfect for delivering a canvas to a client or carrying a few for an art installation. Even use it to pack your samples to show clients during a meeting or ordering session. The canvatote is lightweight and made of strong natural cotton with cotton-webbed handles and a little pocket inside great for holding business cards or hanging hardware. 

Approximate dimensions are 25” wide x 24” high (depth depends on items inside); interior pocket is 7.5” wide x 5.5” high. Color is approximate, actual color may not match your screen due to monitor variations.

name: Classic & Sterling Set
description:
You'll receive one Classic Black Canvatote & one Sterling Gray Canvalope. 

The Canvatote is perfect for delivering a canvas to a client or carrying a few for an art installation. Even use it to pack your samples to show clients during a meeting or ordering session. The canvatote is lightweight and made of strong natural cotton with cotton-webbed handles and a little pocket inside great for holding business cards or hanging hardware. Approximate dimensions are 25” wide x 24” high (depth depends on items inside); interior pocket is 7.5” wide x 5.5” high.

Use the Canvalope in conjunction with your canvatote for extra protection during storage or transport. The canvalope is made of strong natural cotton. Approximate dimensions are 22” wide x 18” high (depth depends on items inside).

name: Sky Canvalope
description:
Use it on its own or in conjunction with a canvatote. This sky (bright cyan) canvalope is made of strong natural cotton. Helps to protect your canvas or framed art during storage or transport. Also a great option in presenting your client with their gallery art canvas.

Approximate dimensions are 22” wide x 18” high (depth depends on items inside). Color is approximate, actual color may not match your screen due to monitor variations.
